meanings.definition: A board resembling a wide ski, used for sliding downhill on snow.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new snowboard for my trip to the mountains.
meanings.sent2: She gracefully glided down the slope on her snowboard.
meanings.sent3: The snowboard looked like a giant skateboard for the snow.
meanings.sent4: His snowboard was his trusty companion on the snowy hills.
meanings.sent5: The colorful snowboard stood out against the white snow.

meanings.definition: To engage in the sport of snowboarding.
meanings.sent1: I love to snowboard down the mountain during winter.
meanings.sent2: They planned to snowboard together on the weekend.
meanings.sent3: He tried to snowboard on the icy sidewalk, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to snowboard through life with excitement and joy.
meanings.sent5: Snowboarding allows you to feel the thrill of the snowy slopes.
